title: Home
description: Landing page for Matt's Fundraiser. Includes donation call-to-action, update videos, and summary of Matt’s transition to independent living.

title: Donate
description: GoFundMe page where you can contribute to support Matt’s move out of the nursing home and into accessible housing.

title: About
description: Learn about Matt Raynor’s journey — from commercial fisherman to quadriplegic coder and artist. Includes videos and Matt's story.

title: Contact
description: Send Matt a message directly via a custom contact form. Great for offering help, opportunities, or encouragement.

title: Blog
description: Read Matt's latest reflections, writing, and updates. Posts often include videos and cover recovery, spirituality, and tech.

title: Other Ways to Help
description: Explore ways to support Matt beyond donations — including helping with housing leads, caregiving, and job referrals.

title: MatthewRaynor.com
description: Matt’s full personal site with access to his store, book, portfolio, blog, photography, and social media links.
